user.help: Add, edit, or remove a user permission.

role.help: List all users of a predefined role.

teach.help:
Teaches a new command to the bot that anyone can execute.
Variable substitution can be used in the reply in the form of {}, {active operator}, or [passive operator].
Type !operators to get a list of available operators.

forget.help: Removes a command that the bot has learned.

memo.help: Leaves a message for an offline user. They will recieve the message as a PM the next time they join.
